attributes.action: bring new rules to ensure that the Speaker of the House of Commons is not a member of the party in power
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Should the Speaker of the House of Commons always be from no political party or be an independent politician this will ensure that the Speaker will be impartial and treat each politician equally.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
